column4: hello, i have a server in my office running websites. i can only reach it via ssh. and i need to reach these sites, so i tried doing ssh -L 3128:localhost:3128 username@host and then adding localhost:3128 as a proxy in my browser, but i still cant reach the sites, is there anything else i can try?
tried vnc then a browser to localhost?
I have similar and a minimal X comes with twm all you need then is dillo or similar
thanks man, lemme try - ledgend! forgot about that channel
